WorkItem.Description:
The stats on the Tankadin model are incorrect. If you would like to make a comparison check out Fairbo of Muradin. 
*NOTE: Stats are based on gear as of 12/5/08
 
Basic Stats
Health - Low by 490
Armor - Off only by the meta gem (2%)
Stamina - High by 1 point
Attack Power - High by 22 points
Defense - High by 1 point
 
Combat Table - This is completely off
Miss - Shows 10.2%, should be 10.72%
Dodge - Shows 15.61%, should be 18.3%
Parry - Shows 15.59%, should be 16.16%
Block - shows 58.61%, should be 32.77% (This includes Holy Shield)

Comments.Message: Just remembered that I am a Miner and am maxed. This would result in the missing 500 HP. The extra 1 stam would drop it to the 490 HP difference.
